mapper.select:
SELECT
t
ORDER BY f_id DESC
ORDER BY ${orderField}

SELECT distinct b.f_id,b.f_mater_code,b.f_batch_no,b.f_outof_quality,b.f_subver_id FROM t_ware_inventorydetail b left join t_ware_outtraylocalmap a on a.f_mater_code=b.f_mater_code and a.f_batch_no=b.f_batch_no where a.f_orderdetail_id=#{orderdetailId}
SELECT * FROM t_ware_inventorydetail WHERE f_batch_no = #{batchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND f_mater_code = #{materCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
